page.title: 09WACTON COURT FARM
page.content:
Total area..................130acres Arable.......................80acres Grassland....................35acres Woodland.....................15acres
Crops grown..wheat,barley,oats, potatoes,silage. Uses of silage...food for sheep and cattle. Farm Machinery...2tractors,1car. Equipment for....silage,fertilising, drilling,ploughing. Animals...85sheep,124fattening lambs, 12chickens,4geese,2horses, 1dog,1cat. Eggs a week.................48 Farm buildings...4barns,1cattle shed, 2farm houses,1grain bin. People...6live on farm,1works on farm.
CLASS 2
